channel.title: 2.02 Mastermind Frame shows Mastermind?
channel.description:
#### What happened? Scorned Framed MM, Sheriff Surv n1 and they saw Mastermind
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Frame shouldn't even have been active yet and MM shouldn't show #### Steps to reproduce: Presumably frame a MM and investigate him with a Sheriff same night
#### Comments: Our heads still hurt

Colin the Butler
n1 serve 10
n2 serve 5
n3 HH
